Original:
三峽北大特區開了一間別緻的高級酒吧，木質日式裝潢帶出典雅的氛圍，從門簾到桌椅都顯現出老闆對裝潢的執著與美感。
與調酒師淺談，得知酒單上這些創調都是出自於他們對調酒經年累月的品酌與經驗，也對我們侃侃而談他們的發想與這杯酒的味道。
從言談間可以感受到調酒師們對工作的熱誠。
這裡是一個很適合放鬆、約會的場域，舒適寬敞的空間配上恰好的光線，客人們也都很有品味，很推薦來這裡小酌一番。
EN:
The Three Gorges Beida Special Economic Zone opened a chic senior bar. The wooden Japanese -style decoration brought an elegant atmosphere. From the curtains to the table and chairs, the boss's dedication and aesthetics of the decoration showed.
Talking with the bartender, we learned that these tones on the wine list are from their discretion and experience of the bartender years, and they also talk about their thoughts and the taste of this glass of wine.
From the talks, you can feel the enthusiasm of the bartender to work.
This is a field that is very suitable for relaxation and dating. The comfortable and spacious space is matched with the right light. The guests are also very tasteful. It is recommended to come here to drink it.

Original:
隱身在北大家樂福商圈附近，低調奢華的裝潢，一進門就有很香的木頭味，佈置非常質感。
簡單小餐點味道卻不簡單；酒單上將每一種調酒都有說明，不過調酒師還是會做詳細的介紹，依據你的喜好推薦最適合你的酒，讓有選擇困難或是喝酒小白可以安心點餐！還有無酒精特調！
適合下班後填飽肚子再小酌放鬆的好去處～
EN:
Hidden is near Beida Laifu Business District. The low -key and luxurious decoration has a very fragrant wood taste as soon as it enters the door. The layout is very textured.
Simple meals are not easy to taste; each bartending is explained on the wine list, but the bartender will still make a detailed introduction. It is recommended to the wine that is most suitable for you according to your preference. Drinking Xiaobai can order with peace of mind!Whether there is alcohol specialty!
Suitable for a good place to fill your stomach after get off work and relax ~

EN: Each alcohol is very distinctive, and the taste is very special.The overall atmosphere is relaxed and comfortable. It is very suitable for about three or five friends to sit and drink a drink.The bartender is very kind and introduced to us very detailedly. It is a good place to relax from friends of Beitao.

Original: 汲寂酒吧真是個讓人驚喜的地方！這裡有優質的調酒，輕鬆的社交場所。酒吧的設計風格簡約而有質感，讓人一進門就感受到與眾不同的氛圍。座位間距寬敞，適合一群朋友熱鬧地聚會，也適合獨自一人來這裡享受片刻的寧靜。特別喜歡這裡的創意調酒，每一杯都充滿了驚喜，不僅口感豐富，還有獨特的擺盤設計，看起來非常有藝術感。店員都很熱情友好，對於酒品的介紹和服務都非常專業。無論是想找個地方放鬆，還是尋求新鮮的調酒體驗，汲寂都是個絕佳的選擇。下次一定還會帶更多朋友一起來！

Each cup is full of surprises. Not only is it rich, but it also has a unique set design, which looks very artistic.The clerks are very enthusiastic and friendly, and they are very professional about the introduction and service of wine.Whether you want to find a place to relax or find a fresh bartending experience, silence is an excellent choice.I will bring more friends together next time!
